data: {"page":1,"results":[{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[28,18],"id":395437,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Sink Hole","overview":"After a massive sinkhole swallows a nearby town, a school bus filled with students is dropped deep underground. After the crash, the students realize the bus is hanging precariously against the side of the sinkhole, held in place by a broken pipe. Any sudden move could send the bus plummeting into the darkness below. Alone and with all the adults injured, the teens struggle for survival with the story taking on shades of Lord of the Flies. Their only hope is a small-town paramedic, who must overcome a tragic past to rescue the students.","popularity":3.787,"poster_path":"/lBrY7yokXZpbxTnqlBe4td5h3bj.jpg","release_date":"2013-04-01","title":"Sink Hole","video":false,"vote_average":5.3,"vote_count":15},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[878,27,18],"id":705516,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Interferenz","overview":"On a bleak island where monolithic concrete buildings rise above the windswept horizon lies work-colony #191286. Piwonka is one of a handful of migrant workers who are forced to work here under harsh conditions. He has been estranged for two months from his beloved wife when a fatal incident at the main drilling-tower occurs. Piwonka has a recurring dream of his wife where it feels like she's trying to communicate with him, to warn him perhaps, or guide his way.","popularity":2.284,"poster_path":"/7v0ROQrORzUkXSQg1ErWPJljI9D.jpg","release_date":"2014-03-20","title":"Interference","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/xznEB3uLBjPpqdrxvqeVYG3i6ow.jpg","genre_ids":[18,28,36],"id":10971,"original_language":"en","original_title":"A Night to Remember","overview":"The sinking of the Titanic is presented in a highly realistic fashion in this tense British drama. Edward John Smith keeping it going at a steady clip.
